name: Mad King PC
description:
The controls you can play with are:

-awsd -> for character movement
-space -> to jump
-Click -> to attack

° I developed my first video game, I hope you like it, thanks Everyone to the UN Domestika Course, Upload Screenshots of tagging me on Twitter to see how many points they get, the game is difficult adj. I really hope you like it

@Seinp_Desingner on twitter I used

Some free sprites called "king and Pigs" that are free right here on itch.io and the enemies were developed by my brother @Uknowleo or as you all know Sun Pixels on twitter
